label: 画指
本: Gender in the Japanese Administrative Code: Laws on Residence Unit, Laws on Officials in the Back Palace: Comprehensive Glossary. Journal of the Historical Association of Senshu University No.69 . 2015
著者: Ijūin, Yoko. Yoshie, Akiko. Piggott, Joan R.
説明文: a means of signing a document without writing, by making a print of a finger
